author: bridge-bot
content:
<RenoRen79> Waking up this morning with this interrogation : how to incentive L2s to respect ERC/EIPs, to improve their level ? How can we talk about mass adoption if normies are taken responsible for their L2 choices, requiring understanding of very complex concepts such as escape hatch, multisigs, optimistic vs zk roll ups ?

L2s got EIP4844 for free, related benefits shall be partially spend in security improvments. Right now L2s have more interest in distributing this value via airdrop/rewards (spring/summers/merits programms) to drag users and increase their TVL.

One possible lever would be blob costs set according to the level reached, level of compatibility with proposals.

author: bridge-bot
content: <vb271828> My hope is that if we make a habit of L2s and wallets upgrading and improving on various key ERCs/EIPs, then compatibility with that ecosystem becomes its own reward
